title: Ep 563 | Jase Discusses Joe Biden, the Unforgivable Sin & What Is a Deathwork?
description:
Jase discusses the greatest politician ever and how the religious leaders at the time did their very best to prevent the solutions to their profitable problems. Zach explains why the unforgivable sin is unforgivable and how to completely avoid it! Al talks about the havoc and destruction that Satan invokes and what the purpose of walking in the Holy Spirit really is. And Zach talks about the hidden mystery of Christ, deathworks, and why men should not worship their own bellies.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Go to https://www.boxofawesome.com/ — use promo code PHIL for 20% off your first box!
